name: 千雪
text:
じゃあまずは、
買った生地を、型紙にそって切っていきましょう
trans:
First of all,
let's cut up the fabric you bought using the pattern paper.

name: 甘奈
text:
はーい
千雪先生、よろしくお願いしまーす☆
trans:
Okaaaay.
Teacher Chiyuki, we're in your hands☆

name: 甜花
text: 千雪先生……お願いします……！
trans: Teacher Chiyuki... Please take care of us...!

name: 千雪
text:
先生……
改めてそう呼ばれると、なんだか緊張しちゃう
trans:
Teacher...
It kinda makes me nervous, being called that.

name: 千雪
text:
甘奈ちゃんは２匹めのクマさんだから、
甜花ちゃんのフォローもお願いね
trans:
This is Amana-chan's second bear,
so I'll be relying on you to support Tenka-chan, okay?

name: 甜花
text: なーちゃんも……先生……
trans: Naa-chan's also... my teacher...

name: 甘奈
text:
えー！
先生とか呼ばれると緊張しちゃうよー！
trans:
Eh!?
I'll get nervous if you call me something like teacher!

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ
では、なーちゃん先生もハサミを持ってくださーい
trans:
Fufu.
Well then, Teacher Naa-chan, please hold the scissors!

name: 甘奈
text:
は、はーい……！
……これに合わせて切ればいいの？
trans:
O-Okay...!
...Should I cut it along the pattern paper?

name: 千雪
text:
うん、そうね
周りを少しだけ残して切ってね
trans:
Yup, that's good.
Cut it so that only a bit is left around its circumference.

name: 甜花
text:
生地、きれい……
ちょっと……もったいない……
trans:
The fabric, so pretty...
It's kind of... a waste...

name: 千雪
text:
そうよね……でも、想像してみて？
この生地が、世界でひとつだけのぬいぐるみになるの
trans:
It does seem like it but... why don't we try imagining this?
That fabric, it'll be made into a one-of-a-kind stuffed animal.

name: 甜花
text:
最高の……クマになる……？
甜花、できるかな……
trans:
It'll turn... into a wonderful stuffed bear...?
I wonder, can Tenka do it...

name: 千雪
text: そう。だから自信を持って！
trans: Yes, it will. That's why you should be confident!

name: 甜花
text: う、うん……！
trans: O-Okay...!

name: 甘奈
text:
なんか、教えてもらうと全然ちがーう
ガンガン切っていけるなー
trans:
It feels kinda different when it's being taught to you.
It's super easy cutting the fabric up~

name: 千雪
text:
わ、甘奈ちゃん早い
じゃあ、ちょっとアクセサリーも作ってみましょうか
trans:
Wah, you finished so fast, Amana-chan.
Now then, why don't we try making a few accessories too?

name: 甘奈
text:
え、本当ー？
作る作る！
trans:
Oh! Really?
I want to try making some!

name: 甜花
text: う……うぅ……
trans: U-Uuu...

name: 千雪
text: 甜花ちゃん、難しい……？
trans: Tenka-chan, are you having a hard time?

name: 甜花
text:
うん……
甜花、なーちゃんみたいに、できない……
trans:
Mhm...
Tenka, can't do it like Naa-chan...

name: 千雪
text:
あら、甜花ちゃんも甘奈ちゃんと同じ布なのね
……すごい、切り方もそっくり……！
trans:
Oh, the cloth you're using is the same as Amana-chan's, right?
...Wow, even the way you cut it is the same...!

name: 甜花
text:
うん……
なーちゃんの……お手本……
trans:
Yup...
I just copied... Naa-chan...

name: 甜花
text:
でも……
すごく……む、難しい……
trans:
But even then...
It's really... difficult...

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃん、甘奈も手伝う！
trans: Tenka-chan, Amana will also give you a hand!

name: 千雪
text: ううん、甘奈ちゃん、大丈夫よ
trans: No, it's okay, Amana-chan.

name: 甘奈
trans: Huh...?

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ、うん……
きっと、お手伝いがなくても、大丈夫じゃないかな
trans:
Fufu, well...
Even without help, she'll probably do fine.

name: 千雪
text:
甜花ちゃん……
昨日甜花ちゃんが買ってた布はどうしたの？
trans:
Tenka-chan...
What happened to the cloth that you bought yesterday?

name: 甜花
text:
え、えと……
あれは……つ、使わないから……
trans:
U-Uhm...
That's... I won't be using it so...

name: 千雪
text:
そうなの？
どうして使わないか、よかったら教えて？
trans:
Is that so?
Would it be alright for you to tell me why you won't be using it?

name: 甜花
text:
うぅ……
あれ……クマっぽく……ないから……
trans:
Uu...
It's... not really bear-like... so...

name: 千雪
text:
ああ……やっぱりそうだったのね
お星さまの柄のクマさんは、ダメ……？
trans:
Aah... So it really is like I thought it was.
Do you think that a bear patterned with stars is no good?

name: 甜花
text:
う……み、みんなと、違う……
なーちゃんとも……
trans:
Uu... I-It's different from everyone's...
Even from Naa-chan's...

name: 千雪
text:
そっかぁ……
甘奈ちゃん、課題に材料の指定はないのよね？
trans:
I see...
Amana-chan, the task didn't tell you to use specific materials, right?

name: 甘奈
text:
うん、ないよ
甜花ちゃん……
trans:
Mhm, it didn't.
Tenka-chan...

name: 甘奈
text: もしかして、無理に甘奈のに合わせてたの……？
trans: Are you trying to mimic what I'm making as much as possible?

name: 甜花
text:
う、ううん！
なーちゃんの、すごく……かわいいから
trans:
N-No!
Naa-chan's stuffed bear... is super cute so...

name: 甜花
text:
なーちゃんみたいに、作ったら……
最高のクマ、できるって……思って……
trans:
I thought that if I made it like how Naa-chan's making it...
I could also make... a wonderful stuffed bear...

name: 千雪
text:
そうね
甘奈ちゃんのは、きっと最高のクマさんになる
trans:
That's right.
Amana-chan's bear will surely turn out to be a wonderful one.

name: 千雪
text:
でも、甜花ちゃんのもそうなのよ
甘奈ちゃんには作れない、甜花ちゃんのクマさん
trans:
But Tenka-chan, yours will also turn out great.
One that isn't similar to Amana-chan's, Tenka-chan's stuffed bear.

name: 千雪
text:
お星さまと、おっきなボタン……
しましまの布もあったかしら？
trans:
We have the star pattern, and the large button...
Do we also have the striped cloth here?

name: 甜花
text:
あう……
か、買ったの……知ってたの……？
trans:
Awh...
You knew... That I bought it...?

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ、隠したのも知ってたわ
なぜなのかは、わからなかったけど
trans:
Fufu, I also know that you were hiding it.
I didn't know your reason for doing it though.

name: 甘奈
text:
そうだったんだ……
甘奈も、あの星のやつのほうが好きだよ
trans:
So that's how it was...
Amana also likes the star pattern better, you know?

name: 甜花
text: な……なーちゃんも……？
trans: N-Naa-chan too...?

name: 甘奈
text:
うん、甜花ちゃんぽくて
すっごいかわいー！
trans:
Yup, it's super cute
and fits Tenka-chan a lot too!

name: 千雪
text:
甜花ちゃん、
隠したのを出してきて、好きに作ってみたらどうかしら
trans:
Tenka-chan, why don't you take out what you're hiding, 
and try making it the way you want to?

name: 千雪
text:
すごい、スイッチ入っちゃったのねえ
ほとんど完成じゃない！
trans:
Wow, you also put a switch huh.
It looks like it's mostly done!

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……
trans: Nihehe...

name: 甘奈
text:
へへー
甘奈と、鼻がお揃いなんだー
trans:
Heheー
It has the same nose as Amana's.

name: 千雪
text:
うん、
すごくかわいいわ、ふたりとも！
trans:
Mhm,
both of your stuffed bears are super cute!

name: 甜花
text:
千雪さんは……
何……作ってるの……？
trans:
Chiyuki-san...
What... are you making...?

name: 甘奈
text:
うん、甘奈も聞きたい
それもクマさんでしょ……？
trans:
Yeah, Amana wanted to ask about that too.
That's a bear, right...?

name: 千雪
text:
これ？
ふふ、双子のクマさんを護る、騎士さんたち
trans:
These?
Fufu, they're knights that'll protect the twins' bears.

name: 千雪
text:
最高のクマさんたちには、
お仕えするクマさんがいなきゃね
trans:
For the most wonderful bears,
it's just right that they have loyal bear attendants too, right?

name: 千雪
text:
ふたりが作っている間にもう何体か……
って思ったんだけど……
trans:
While you two were making your stuffed bears,
I was thinking about what kind of shape they should take and...

name: 甘奈
text:
す……すごーい！
剣とかもある！
trans:
W-Wow...!
They have things like swords too!

name: 甜花
text:
千雪さん……ありがとう……
甜花、好きな布で作って……よかった……
trans:
Chiyuki-san... Thank you...
I'm glad that Tenka... was able to use the cloth she wanted to use...

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ
それなら、ほんとによかったわ
trans:
Fufu.
In that case, I'm really glad too.

name: 甜花
text:
で……でも……
まだ、１匹……足りない……
trans:
B-But...
One... isn't enough...

name: 甘奈
text: うん、千雪さんがいないねー
trans: I agree, there isn't one for Chiyuki-san yet.

name: 千雪
text: ええ？　ふたりの課題だから、私はいいのよ
trans: Huh? It was an assignment for both of you, so I'm fine.

name: 甜花
text: な、なーちゃん……
trans: N-Naa-chan...

name: 甘奈
text: へへーわかってるよ、甜花ちゃん
trans: Hehe. I get it, Tenka-chan.

name: 甜花
text:
うん……千雪さんのクマ……
て、甜花たちが……作るね……！
trans:
Yeah... Chiyuki-san's bear...
T-Tenka... will make it, okay...!
